title: Configure GAME firewall
description: This is the page for configuring GAME DDoS protection for the selected IP. Multiple firewall rules can be configured to better protect all the applications hosted on the selected IP.
subDescription: Tip: You can choose “Other” protocol to allow any kind of traffic flow to one or more specific ports. We suggest applying the “Default Deny” policy, which will block all other (unspecified) ports, for enhanced security.
max_rules_reached_tooltip: You have reached the maximum number of rules
deny_strategy_tooltip: Block all traffic that does not meet any of the following rules.
disable_deny_strategy_modal_description: In doing this, the only protected sets will be those that meet defined rules. All other traffic can reach the selected IP without being protected. Do you want to continue?
enable_deny_strategy_modal_description: All the game ports that have been set are protected by the GAME firewall. Henceforth, all other traffic will be blocked. Do you want to continue?
default_deny_strategy_enabled_success_me: The GAME’s default DDoS protection policy change will be done in a few minutes.
default_deny_strategy_disabled_success_m: The default GAME DDoS protection policy will be disabled in a few minutes.
add_rule_success_message: The firewall rule will be added
delete_rule_success_message: The firewall rule will be deleted
confirmDeleteRuleDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{protocol}} protocol rule ({{port}})?
missingPortError: You need to select a port
startPortGreaterThanEndPortError: The starting port is larger than the final port
portRangeError: Please enter a value between 1 and 65535
conflictingRuleError: The port (or port range) conflicts with another rule
